newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Transocean estimate cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Transocean estimate cut.

text.p: Oppenheimer & Co cut its second quarter earnings estimate for Transocean Offshore Inc to $0.55 a share from $0.61.
-- Transocean earlier said it expected its earnings to be $0.10 per share less than Wall Street estimates of $0.65.

-- Analyst Carol Lau said in a research note that Oppenheimer has also cut its full year 1997 forecast to $3.25 per share from $3.40, but is leaving its 1998 forecast at $6.00, although she noted that this number could be vulnerable to higher-than-projected expense levels.

-- "Nevertheless, we are maintaining our market-perform rating on the shares because of the company's high-quality deepwater rig fleet, which we believe wil continue to draw attractive rates and contracts.
